skillTree.localised_description: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
When two or more units in the same army share this attribute,  intensity increases the power of spells cast.

skillTree.localised_description: Constructed by the Celestial Court, this is a smaller version of the great construct in Wei-Jin.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
When two or more units in the same army share this attribute,  intensity increases the power of spells cast.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs single and multiple units

skillTree.localised_description: The turbulent Winds of Magic can do little harm to those who have found harmony amidst its raging currents.
The best way to repel the chaotic flurry of missile fire is to meet it with order, discipline, and a stalwart row of shields.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: True experience is born only on the battlefield.

effects.description:
Spell resistance: 2% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Spell resistance: 4% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Spell resistance: 8% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The most formidable Imperial wizards have an unquenchable thirst for knowledge and a consuming need to constantly expand their magical repertoire.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2% for all spells
Winds of Magic cost: -4% for all spells
Winds of Magic cost: -8% for all spells

skillTree.localised_description: Carefully preparing a series of overlapping deflection spells before engaging in combat can mean the difference between life and death.
Those who seek greater understanding will find when time comes.

Winds of Magic power reserve change: +5% when increasing
	(own armies in province)

Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing
	(own armies in province)

Winds of Magic power reserve change: +15% when increasing
	(own armies in province)

skillTree.localised_description: Drain the winds of magic before the enemy can turn them against us.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing
	(all units in army)

Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve change: -10% when increasing
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Practiced in the art of casting; always with a spell at the ready.
Your life is balanced on the edge of a knife when drawing from the winds. Too swift, and the winds will claim your life. Too slow, and the enemy will.

effects.description:
Miscast base chance: -1%
	(own characters in region)

Miscast base chance: -2%
	(own characters in region)

Miscast base chance: -4%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: We will not allow them to take our homes, our lands!
With the right amount of preparation, everything can harnessed to empower even the soldierâ€™s mundane weapons.

	(own armies in region)

Weapon strength: +2% when attacking
	(own armies in region)

	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: So great is this oneâ€™s raw power that the winds gust in unison.

	(own armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
When two or more units in the same army share this attribute,  intensity increases the power of spells cast.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Violence is always the answer, even when it's not.
There's nothing wrong with being aware of one's capabilities - particularly when one is capable of so much.
Deception is frowned upon, but only if you're found out.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: In a battle of wills, one must not falter.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Even Slaanesh would be unable to break this one's self control.
No being can kill what it cannot catch.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

effects.description: adds the ability that grants the spell intensity
Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If knowledge is power, then this one is powerful indeed.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +15% when increasing

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "The trick is to think two steps aheadâ€¦ and then think one step ahead of that."
This one could challenge an Ogre to an arm-wrestling match.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -5% for Jade Warriors, Jade Warriors (Halberds) and Jade Warrior Crossbowmen units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If there is anything left to learn about military planning, this one has yet to come across it.

effects.description:
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Hardy and resilient, this being stands firm in the face of all challenges.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +5% for melee units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: No arms have yet been forged that this warrior has been unable to master.
When the arrows are spent and the blades are all blunted, this perfect warrior can rely on their well-trained body to keep death from their door.

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -5%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A place for everything and everything in its place. Live by this motto and Chaos will stand out like the proverbial sore thumb.

effects.description:
Leadership: +2 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Norsca
	(armies in local owned region)
Ward save: 10% when fighting against Norsca, Warriors of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Daemons of Chaos

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Some may consider administration a tiresome process, but this servant of the Celestial Emperor knows that a tidy society makes for an efficient, effective one.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -5% for all buildings
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: An inquisitive nature is only part of the skillset required for the Dragon's questioner, tasked with ensuring harmony prevails over Celestial lands.
